Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • Date
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Date>
    public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Date>
    Custom Date implemention supporting day, month, and year. It does not support any smaller units of time such as seconds, minutes, hours, etc. Implements the Comparable interface in order for easy comparison against dates to determine which date is before
